snippet: Monaco withstood Arsenal’s onslaught to reach the quarterfinals of the Champions League despite a 2-0 home defeat, advancing on the away goals rule after drawing, 3-3, on aggregate.
abstract: Monaco reaches quarterfinals of the Champions League despite 2-0 loss to Arsenal, advancing on away goals rule after drawing, 3-3, on aggregate; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Monaco withstood Arsenal’s onslaught to reach the quarterfinals of the Champions League despite a 2-0 home defeat, advancing on the away goals rule after drawing, 3-3, on aggregate.

headline.main: Monaco Ousts Arsenal in Champions League
